artist: Ilonka Karasz; Paye & Baker Manufacturing Company, 1901-1935
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: Set includes teapot, creamer, sugar bowl.
markings: [05 / E.P.N.S. / Made in U.S.A. / IK] and maker\'s mark [P & B] (In hearts), on bottom of handle
text: In addition to Art Deco designs in silver, ceramics, textiles, and furniture, Ilonka Karasz contributed illustrations for the cover of New Yorker Magazine for more than thirty years beginning around 1940.
title: Tea pot from a tea set
